attributes.action: Ensure that BBC Trust & Ofcom jointly investigate and restaff the BBC News group
attributes.additional_details:
Thus BBC News belongs to all & has an ethical & constitutional duty to provide accurate & impartial information & balanced comment. Having so lamentably failed its duty in recent years, in Referendum debate, and even more so afterwards by hysterically talking down the future prospects of the country, increasing division, distrust, & anger & encouraging anxiety & fear in the young, it is now pushing one candidate to be Britain's next Prime Minister
more at http://www.facebook.com/BBCNewsPetition
attributes.background: which is failing the nation, discarding all pretence at impartiality and at balanced reporting,  becoming a propaganda tool for an international elite, & suppressing news not welcome to its own agenda. The BBC has a unique position in British society, funded by the people individually

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because both the BBC Trust and Ofcom are independent of the Government and Parliament. 

You can find out about the BBC complaints system here:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/complaints/
